changeSet.author: initial-data
changeSet.sql: insert into TAMW_RESOURCEGROUP_AUD (select ID, TAMW_RESOURCEGROUP.OUTOFSERVICERELEASE_ID, TAMW_RESOURCEGROUP.V, 1 as REV, 0 as REVTYPE, TAMW_RESOURCEGROUP.NAME, TAMW_RESOURCEGROUP.RESOURCETYPE_ID, TAMW_RESOURCEGROUP.FCEXTERNALLINK, TAMW_RESOURCEGROUP.FCEXTERNALKEY from TAMW_RESOURCEGROUP);

changeSet.author: initial-data
changeSet.sql: insert into TAMW_RESOURCE_AUD (select ID, 1 as REV, 0 as REVTYPE, TAMW_RESOURCE.DELETABLE, TAMW_RESOURCE.NAME, TAMW_RESOURCE.PREVIOUSVERSION_ID, TAMW_RESOURCE.RESOURCETYPE_ID, TAMW_RESOURCE.VERSION_ID, TAMW_RESOURCE.RELEASE_ID, TAMW_RESOURCE.RESOURCEGROUP_ID, TAMW_RESOURCE.FCOWNER, TAMW_RESOURCE.SOFTLINKID, TAMW_RESOURCE.LOCALPORTID from TAMW_RESOURCE);

changeSet.author: initial-data
